comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: He doesn't look like one of the richest people in the world.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date written on negative is 10/19/12. NYT of October 20, 1912 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980CE4D6113AE633A... reported that Carnegie had arrived back from his summer holiday in Scotland on the White Star Liner, the Baltic.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks!  We'll fix the date in the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 38129431@N08
comment._content: The fact that Carnegie doesn't look like one of the richest people in the world is why he was able to become so rich.  He focused on his work, not on his social standing. He concentrated on constantly having an advantage over all of the competition.
